components.name: Avatar
components.description: An Avatar repesents a user. Avatars can render either an image or initials.

components.name: Button
components.description: A button represents that an action will occur when the user clicks or touches it.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: A Checkbox represents a boolean value that can be in one of two states, true or false.

components.name: Switch
components.description: A Switch represents a value that can be toggled on or off.
